metadata.subject: Re: Locate a Clinical Trial Near You - MyClinicalTrialLocator.com

relationships.description: Communicating about clinical trial locator website
Jeffrey E. forwarded information to Biden's private email

analysis.purpose: To describe and promote a clinical trial locator website and confirm information was forwarded to Biden
analysis.significance: Shows communication between medical professional and Jeffrey Epstein, with mention of information being sent to Biden's private email

notable_quotes: This is Aaron's website not an app it allows anyone to type in any cancer term and find any clinical trial or researcher worldwide
red_flags: Mention of sending information to 'biden private' (potentially private email)

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found in this communication

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed or evidenced in this communication

public_knowledge.context: Communication involving Jeffrey Epstein with mention of Biden could be of media interest given historical context of Epstein's connections

analysis.summary: Bruce Moskowitz describes a clinical trial locator website to Jeffrey Epstein, who confirms he forwarded the information to 'biden private,' indicating communication with someone connected to Biden through private channels.
